item.title: Prayer to the young moon
item.summary: !nanni recites a prayer to the young moon. The people pray to the moon so that they may find food and eat.
item.comments: 1) p.9435v: !nanni heard this from his father, 2) See also Young moon's story, 3) The |xam also pray to the moon for food (see Prayers to the moon, from the |xam Book II-1), 4) This story is found in Book XI & XII-6
item.author: !nanni (XI)

keyword.subkw: and a !kun prayer to the young moon
a prayer for the finding of
recites a prayer to the young moon
